products.title: Hopsack Wicker Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Hopsack Wicker Roman Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £15.58 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our rustic Hopsack range offers you a natural textured fabric which combines tradition with a contemporary feel.  
 
This classic cream roman blind has an attractive textured finish and will fit in well in most rooms due to the neutral tone of the fabric. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM0691 Fabric Colour: Wicker Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

Our Azurite Chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish.  This soft mustard yellow roman blind fuses a plush, luxuy feel in a contemporary yellow tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman comes with our FREE five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching curtain!

products.productdescription:
Tie together a modern scheme with this smart window blind. The Banbury Parchment Mink Roman blind will provide practical shading at your windows and is sleek and easy to open and close using the sidewinder chain. This design features a striking geometric pattern in a warm grey colourway that will suit a range of neutral and contemporary interior schemes.

products.title: Porthos Parchment
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Porthos Parchment Deluxe Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Deluxe Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 350mm Max Width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm)
 	Min Drop: 400mm Max Drop: 2500mm
 	Fabric Composition: 100% Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Sidewinder control.
 	Fabric Lining: Fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available.
 	Fixings: Fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: Robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep.
 	Finish: Fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
